void edu.ou.asgbook.motion.KalmanFilter.init ( double  x_0,
double  dx_0 
) 

00037                                              {
00038         k = 0;
00039         // x_k
00040         x_k = new Matrix(2,1);
00041         x_k.set(0,0, x_0);
00042         x_k.set(1,0, dx_0);
00043 
00044         // p_k
00045         p_k = new Matrix( 2, 2 ); // all zero
00046 
00047         // assume unit white noise for errors before we see any observations.
00048         R_k = 1;
00049         Q_k = Matrix.identity(2,2);
00050     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.motion.KalmanFilter.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00132                                                             {
00133         double[] truex = new double[20];
00134         double[] trueu = new double[truex.length];
00135         double[] obsx = new double[truex.length];
00136         truex[0] = 5;
00137         trueu[0] = 3;
00138         obsx[0]= truex[0] + noise();
00139 
00140         KalmanFilter kalman = new KalmanFilter(obsx[0], trueu[0]); // assume that we have a reasonable guess of u to start ...
00141         double true_acc = 0.2;
00142         
00143         System.out.println("true x & true velocity & observed x & estimate of x & estimate of velocity \\\\");
00144         for (int i=1; i < truex.length; ++i){
00145             trueu[i] = trueu[i-1] + true_acc;
00146             truex[i] = truex[i-1] + trueu[i-1];
00147             obsx[i] = noise() + truex[i];
00148             kalman.update(obsx[i]);
00149             System.out.println( df(truex[i]) + " & " + df(trueu[i]) + " & " + df(obsx[i]) + " & " + df(kalman.getValue()) + " & " + df(kalman.getRateOfChange()) + " \\\\");
00150         }

void edu.ou.asgbook.motion.KalmanFilter.update ( double  z_k  )  

00056                                    {
00057         ++k; // observation number ...
00058         if ( MAX_HISTORY > 0 && k > MAX_HISTORY ){
00059             k = MAX_HISTORY; // k is used in computing Q_k and R_k
00060         }
00061         
00062         // P_k+1 and x_k+1 will be computed on next turn around so that getValue()
00063         // works correctly ...
00064         p_k = phi.copy().times(p_k).times(phiT).plus(Q_k);
00065         x_k = phi.copy().times(x_k);
00066 
00067 
00068         // Kalman gain
00069         double inv = H.copy().times(p_k).times(HT).get(0,0) + R_k;
00070         final Matrix K_k = p_k.copy().times(HT).times( 1.0 / inv );
00071 
00072         // observation error
00073         final double v_k = z_k - H.copy().times(x_k).get(0,0);
00074 
00075         // update x_k
00076         final Matrix update = K_k.copy().times(v_k);
00077         x_k = x_k.plus( update );
00078 
00079         // estimate R_k, covariance of observation error to use next time 'round
00080         R_k = ( (k-1) * R_k + v_k * v_k ) / k;
00081 
00082         // estimate Q_k, covariance of model error to use in P_k+1 computation
00083         if ( k != 1 ){ // when k is 1, x_k=old_x_k and so Q_k would become 0
00084             final Matrix wkT = update.copy().transpose();
00085             final Matrix wk_wkT = update.copy().times(wkT);
00086             Q_k = Q_k.times(k-1).plus(wk_wkT).times(1.0/k);
00087         }
00088 
00089         // update error covariance for updated estimate
00090         p_k = Matrix.identity(2,2).minus(K_k.copy().times(H)).times(p_k);
00091 
00092         if ( finite(getValue()) == false || finite(getRateOfChange()) == false ){
00093             double new_val = getValue();
00094             if ( finite(new_val) == false ) new_val = 0;
00095             double new_rate = getRateOfChange();
00096             if ( finite(new_rate) == false ) new_rate = 0;
00097             init( new_val, new_rate );
00098         }
00099     }
